version_description:
1. Optimize data security protection capability.
2.Fixed some known bugs.

1. [Premium Guardian] Huawei Blood Pressure Watch Exclusive Service
Blood pressure management: a thoughtful reminder for you to develop the habit of regularly measuring blood pressure
Healthy Living: Provide professional weekly health reports and healthy living guidance.
2. [Vibrant Life] Enrich the rights and interests of members
Smart Fat Loss Program: Tailored and Personalized Smart Fat Loss Program for Easy and Healthy Fat Loss
Sleeping music: Enjoy members' exclusive sleep music to relieve stress and relax and improve sleep quality.
Excellent Courses: A More Professional Fitness Course Preemptive Experience
Customized recipes and diet analysis: providing you with a more professional diet management solution
Breathing training: easy to master the correct breathing method, keep a relaxed attitude
3. [My Assets] New functions go live.
Manage your coupons and prizes in a unified manner.
4. [Optimization] The user experience of the intelligent running plan and ECG functions is optimized.

[Premium Guardian] Huawei Blood Pressure Watch Exclusive Service
	Blood pressure management: a thoughtful reminder for you to develop the habit of regularly measuring blood pressure
	Healthy Living: Provide professional weekly health reports and healthy living guidance.
[Exclusive rights] Provides exclusive rights for HUAWEI WATCH D users.

	Customized recipes and diet analysis: providing you with a more professional diet management solution
	Breathing training: easy to master the correct breathing method, keep a relaxed attitude
